sentence.idiomatic: How is your business recently?
Business at this shop is always very good.
Our business is doing pretty well recently.
Everyone hopes to be able to emerge from the competition victorious.
The competition amongst mobile phone companies has been really fierce in recent years.
If there is no competition there won't be any development.
An intense match is about to start.
They have been carrying on a fierce debate about this issue.
This really is a fierce football match.
We must think of a way to reduce costs.
The cost of these products is too high.
The cost of a product dictates a product's price.
We have a long way to go to reach the standard of a developed nation.
Technological developments have brought a lot of benefits to our lives.
The industry here has been very developed for a long time.
This is the best trading company here.
Our company conducts import and export trading.
He is studying international trade in school.
The plan you proposed to promote the product is very good.
Some companies like promoting their products on the internet.
Our new products needs to be promoted in the market.
He has experience studying abroad.
A lot of young people want to study overseas.
After graduation, he went to work overseas.
We haven't found a supplier yet.

word.literal: to change to a new one

sentence.idiomatic: The original supplier is not good, so we want to switch to another one.
We need to choose one of these companies to be our supplier.
She has always wanted to have a pet.

word.literal: to be more and more common

sentence.idiomatic: More and more people have pets now.
On his birthday mother gave him a pet.
Can you give me a discount on this clothing?
The goods in their shop are on sale right now.
These products aren't discounted.
Hey, long time no see. I’ve heard your business is doing pretty well!
Well, just average. After we joined the WTO, doing import/export became pretty difficult. There are more opportunities, but the competition is also fiercer now.
That’s right, now import duties keep on going down, but foreign countries now want to increase the duties on goods exported from China. In view of this, what do you do?

You have to control production costs yourself. Now technology is so developed, especially the internet. It has made international trade a lot more convenient, and has also reduced costs. Now I basically do all my own business expansion and search for overseas buyers over the internet.
That’s really great! I remember before you were doing import/export for clothing, are you still doing that now?
I still mainly do clothing. After all I know it well, and I have cooperated with those suppliers and buyers for a long time. Besides that, though, I have started a new project.
Really? What is it?
Pet products. Hey, don’t you have a dog? Next time you need anything, ask me to get it for you.
But I would feel bad. Just giving me a discount would be great.
Whatever you like.
